punishments.content: Do 30 seconds of plank!
Do 20 push-ups!
Tell a joke to the group!
Do 15 jumping jacks!
Sing a song of your choice!
Do a silly dance for 30 seconds!
Imitate your favorite animal!
Do 10 squats!
Share an embarrassing story!
Balance on one leg for 30 seconds!
Do 5 burpees!
Act like a celebrity of your choice!
Do a handstand against the wall!
Speak in an accent for the next round!
Do 10 sit-ups!
Pretend to be a waiter/waitress and take snack orders!
Do a cartwheel!
Do 20 high knees!
Share your most recent embarrassing moment!
Do a funny impression of someone in the room!
